info.name: Invoice API
info.description:
API Rest for the control and registration of invoices, clients and users.

Develop with Laravel 10.48.10 (PHP ^8.1)

_Considerations_

- _Check Users into database can be change._
    
- _Admin email and password always is same._

request.description:
Login users.

_Considerations_

- _Check Users into database can be change._
- _Admin email and password always is same._
Log out user and detroy token.

query.description: Users per page
Email filter. Can be use: 'eq'
Is admin (boolean) filter. Can be use: 'eq'
Last Access date filter. Can be use: 'eq', 'ne', 'lt', 'lte', 'gt', 'gte'
Created at date filter  Can be use: 'eq', 'ne', 'lt', 'lte', 'gt', 'gte'
Updated at date filter  Can be use: 'eq', 'ne', 'lt', 'lte', 'gt', 'gte'

request.description: Retrive a complete list of registrered users.
Create a new user.
Retrive user by id

Delete user by id.  
  
_Only for admin user._

Update user profile.

_Only for the user themselves (not admin)._

Update user profile.

_Only for the user themselves (not admin)._
Retrive a complete list of customers.
